thread.section_title: Intrepid Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intrepid Travel | www.intrepidtravel.com | 2 of 10
thread.title: Maria

author: Maria
title: Maria
text: Warning; just for Fit people also for people who dont mind paying for experiencing discomfort and third world life experience. The experience is fantastic for those have not experienced poverty and would love the experience of being poor. I have lived with poverty all my life and I never want to go back to that life ever again. It's was quite pricey for me. I didn't need to pay expensively to experience poverty or living poorly.
